alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Warning issued May 28 at 3:23AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...High Surf Warning in effect through tonight... * SURF...Dangerous surfs of 13 to 16 ft will impact south and east facing shores of the islands tonight through Saturday. Surfs will subside to advisory levels tonight. * TIMING...through tonight * IMPACTS...Dangerous surfs and deadly rip currents Lapataiga mo galu matua maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 321 VAVEAO ASO TOANA`I ME 28 2022 ...O le a iai Lapataiga mo Galu maualuluga seia oo i le po nanei... * GALU...Galu matua maualuluga e 13 i le 16 futu o le a aafia ai talafatai i saute ma sasa`e i le po nanei. * TAIMI...seia oo i le po nanei. * AAFIAGA...Galu matua maualuluga ma e malolosi le aave o le sami. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O lapataiga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gatafale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aava o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Faiva po o le ona o le siisii o tulaga o sami ma galu, e le tatau i le au fai mamalu lautele ona fagogota pe maimoa i galu. O i latou i le matafaga, e mafai ona maua faafuaseia e galu.
info.instruction: A high surf warning indicates dangerous large breaking waves will pound the shoreline in the warning area, producing deadly rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
